collection:
This Privacy Policy outlines our practices concerning the
collection, use, and sharing of information through our service.

Information Collection**

At Youtube Summerizer, we do not collect any personal data from our users.

The
only information we gather is the URL of YouTube videos that users input into
our service.

This collection is solely for the purpose of extracting script
text from the specified YouTube videos.

Children's Privacy**

Our service is not directed towards children under the age of 16, and we do
not knowingly collect data from children under this age.
sharing:
This Privacy Policy outlines our practices concerning the
collection, use, and sharing of information through our service.

Sharing of Information**

Youtube Summerizer does not share any information, including the YouTube video
URLs, with third parties.
